retailer.title: Reseller management
retailer.subtitle: View cashback and withdrawals
retailer.description: You're a reseller, you can earn cashback from invited users' paid orders
retailer.rulesShortDescription: Learn how to earn cashback rewards
retailer.inviteCodeHint: Share this invitation code or link, invite friends to register and purchase membership to earn cashback rewards
retailer.becomeRetailerTitle: Become a reseller, earn promotional income
retailer.becomeRetailerDesc: Earn cashback commission when invited users pay, easily achieve passive income

retailerStats.title: Reseller achievements
retailerStats.subtitle: View your promotional earnings
retailerStats.usersNeeded: Need {{count}} more paid users to upgrade
retailerStats.contentProofNeeded: Content creation proof required for upgrade

retailerRule.freezePeriod: Freeze period: Cashback must be frozen for 30 days before withdrawal (to prevent refund risk)
retailerRule.settlementCycle: Settlement cycle: Cashback is credited to wallet in real-time, automatically transferred to withdrawable balance after freeze period
retailerRule.refundDeduction: Refund handling: If a user requests a refund, the corresponding cashback will be deducted from your wallet
retailerRule.withdrawalFee: Withdrawal fee: Borne by the reseller (specific fees depend on payment channel, generally 3-5% of withdrawal amount)
retailerRule.withdrawalTime: Processing time: Withdrawal requests will be processed within 14 days
retailerRule.withdrawalAccount: Withdrawal account: You must add and verify a payment address in "Wallet Management" first
retailerRule.ruleModification: The platform reserves the right to modify reseller rules at any time. Modified rules will take effect immediately upon announcement
retailerRule.disputeResolution: If you have any questions or disputes about reseller rules, please contact customer service promptly
retailerRule.finalInterpretation: The platform reserves the right of final interpretation of these rules
retailerRule.agreement: Continued use of reseller features indicates you have read and agree to all the above terms.
